lead_paragraph: Taurice Scott threw three touchdown passes and ran for another score and Mount Union won its N.C.A.A.-best 12th football title, beating St. Thomas of Minnesota, 49-35.

headline.main: Mount Union Notches 12th Division III Title
headline.print_headline: Mount Union Notches 12th Division III Title

snippet: Taurice Scott threw three touchdown passes and ran for another score and Mount Union won its N.C.A.A.-best 12th football title, beating St. Thomas of Minnesota, 49-35.
